TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ModelSource extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IModelSource

summary.para: An implementation of that produces a model based on the properties exposed on the context. The model is cached to avoid recreating it every time it is requested.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .
